package.description: This is a set of tools for recording from and playing back to ROS topics. It is intended to be high performance and avoids deserialization and reserialization of the messages.
package.author: Jeremy Leibs (leibs@willowgarage.com), James Bowman (jamesb@willowgarage.com), Ken Conley (kwc@willowgarage.com), and Tim Field (tfield@willowgarage.com)
